text:
A 22-year-old woman who had given birth to a child recently, was allegedly sexually assaulted in the ICU of a private hospital at Bahadurgarh in Haryana’s Jhajjar district.

The police has launched raids in Bahadurgarh and its neighbouring areas to nab the accused whose movements were captured on CCTV cameras installed at the hospital.

The incident occurred early on Saturday when the man walked inside the hospital and committed the crime, Jhajjar SP, Sumit Kumar said on Sunday.

“The victim first thought a doctor was examining her and soon thereafter the accused walked out after committing the crime,” Mr. Kumar said.

After the incident, the woman called a nurse to inform her husband who later lodged a complaint with the police

The SP said that though their priority was to arrest the accused, action will be initiated against hospital staff and security as well if negligence on their part is found.

Haryana Health Minister Anil Vij said the police had been directed to take swift action in the matter. — PTI
title: Woman sexually assaulted in Haryana hospital
